attributes.action: Put Gates and warning signs up to not enter the River Thames in all open areas
attributes.background: Put gates up and signage to make people and children aware not to enter the River Thames.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The London Assembly also has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
